tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE art_exhibitions (
  exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE art_exhibitions (
  exhibition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
  artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  birthdate DATE,
  style VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
  exhibition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
  artist_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  nationality VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  style TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
  artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(100),
  artist_id UUID REFERENCES artists(artist_id),
  medium VARCHAR(50),
  price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE exhibitions (
  exhibition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE artworks (
  artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  medium VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE exhibition_artworks (
  exhibition_id UUID,
  artwork_id UUID,
  PRIMARY KEY (exhibition_id, artwork_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (exhibition_id) REFERENCES exhibitions(exhibition_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (artwork_id) REFERENCES artworks(artwork_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Exhibition (
  exhibition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  exhibition_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE Artwork (
  artwork_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  artwork_name VARCHAR(255),
  artist_id UUID REFERENCES Artist(artist_id),
  creation_date DATE,
  medium VARCHAR(255)
);
